scripts.release: npm run dump:docker && npm run docker:build && docker push demidv/lush-db:latest
scripts.docker:start: docker start -ai lush-db || npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:run: docker run --name lush-db -p 3307:3307 -e MYSQL_TCP_PORT=3307 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=lush demidv/lush-db:latest
scripts.release:preview: npm run dump:preview:docker && npm run docker:build:preview && docker push demidv/lush-db:preview.latest
scripts.docker:start:preview: docker start -ai lush-db-preview || npm run docker:run:preview
scripts.docker:run:preview: docker run --name lush-db-preview -p 3307:3307 -e MYSQL_TCP_PORT=3307 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=lush demidv/lush-db:preview.latest
